column.name: crval1
column.description: Reference position RA (FK5 J2000) at crpix1,crpix2

column.name: crval2
column.description: Reference position Dec (FK5 J2000) at crpix1,crpix2

column.name: moonesb
column.description: Moon excess in sky brightness in V-band

column.name: photcalflag
column.description: Flag for whether image has been photometrically calibrated (0=NO, 1=YES)

column.name: domestat
column.description: Dome status at beginning of exposure ('open' or 'close')

column.name: ptrigger
column.description: trigger ID for TOO, e.g. VOEVENT-Nr

column.name: telra
column.description: Telescope apparent equinox of date R.A. from TCS

column.name: teldec
column.description: Telescope apparent equinox of date Dec. from TCS

column.name: telha
column.description: Telescope apparent equinox of date hour angle

column.name: peakdist
column.description: Mean distance between brightest pixel and centroid pixel

column.name: trackra
column.description: Track speed RA relative to sidereal

column.name: trackdec
column.description: Track speed Dec relative to sidereal

column.name: vbest
column.description: Best processed version at any given time (always > 0)

column.name: cdelt1
column.description: deg/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 1 (x)

column.name: cdelt2
column.description: deg/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 2 (y)

column.name: crota2
column.description: image twist angle of +axis2 W of N

column.name: naxis1
column.description: number of pixels in x (data axis 1)

column.name: naxis2
column.description: number of pixels in y (data axis 2)

column.name: receivedat
column.description: When raw image was split from camera image (date/time)

column.name: replace
column.description: Flag to replace image-metadata record in IRSA database [0=NO, 1=YES]

column.name: spt_ind
column.description: Level 7 HTM index of (ra, dec), decimal encoding

column.name: crval1
column.description: Value at ref pixel on axis 1

column.name: crval2
column.description: Value at ref pixel on axis 2

column.name: ra
column.description: ICRS right ascension at image center

column.name: limitmagunits
column.description: Data units of limiting magnitude of reference image

column.name: nscampdetectedstarsunits
column.description: Data units of number of SCAMP detected stars

column.name: modefwhm
column.description: Mode of FWHM of reference-image sources

column.name: modefwhmunits
column.description: Data units of mode of FWHM of reference-image sources

column.name: minmjdunits
column.description: Data units of minimum MJD of reference-image inputs

column.name: maxmjdunits
column.description: Data units of maximum MJD of reference-image inputs

column.name: refimnuminputsunits
column.description: Data units of number of reference-image inputs

column.name: saturationlevelunits
column.description: Data units of reference-image saturation level

column.name: cdelt1
column.description: deg/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 1 (x)

column.name: cdelt2
column.description: deg/pix scale at crpix1,crpix2 for axis 2 (y)

column.name: crota2
column.description: image twist angle of +axis2 W of N

column.name: naxis1
column.description: number of pixels in x (data axis 1)

column.name: naxis2
column.description: number of pixels in y (data axis 2)

column.name: rawpsfrfaid
column.description: Reference-image ancillary file database ID of raw PSF file

column.name: psfgridrfaid
column.description: Reference-image ancillary file database ID of PSF-grid file

column.name: psfds9regrfaid
column.description: Reference-image ancillary file database ID of PSF-fit catalog DS9 region file

column.name: depthrfaid
column.description: Reference-image ancillary file database ID of depth-of-coverage image

column.name: uncrfaid
column.description: Reference-image ancillary file database ID of uncertainty image

column.name: spt_ind
column.description: Level 7 HTM index of (ra, dec), decimal encoding
